about_the_game:
Compete in catching the most popular American fish species with the help of World Bass Tour Pack, a set of tournament tackle carefully designed for the true bass professionals. It contains a pair of sturdy rods and reels capable of handling unique trophies; a generous assortment of great baits, bass jigs, spinnerbaits, and other lures that no Bass can resist! The pack also includes a capacious fishing jacket, a rod cover for four rods, and an excellent large net for your big catches.

World Bass Tour Pack includes:
* 40000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCOINS
* 7-DAYS PREMIUM
* 50 Slots
* 2 Tackle Setup Slots

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* MagFin™ WBT BassStriker™ 7' 10" (240) SE - Length: 7' 10" (2.4 m); Lure Weight: 1/2 - 1 5/8 Oz (14–45 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 9–24 Lb (4–11 kg); Action: Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 10
* MagFin™ WBT BassEnchanter™ 7' 3" (220) NE - Length: 7' 3" (2.2 m); Lure Weight: 3/8-1 3/7 Oz (10–40 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 7.5–23 Lb (3.5–10.5 kg); Action: Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 10
Reels:
* RIVERTEX™ WBT Maelstrom 4000 - Ratio: 6.2; Recovery: 29.5" (75 cm); Capacity: Mono 12/120 (0.3/120), Braid 20/160 (0.23/160); Max Drag: 23 Lb (10.5 kg); Brake: Magnetic & Centrifugal
* MagFin™ WBT DragAssistant 3500 S - Ratio: 6.3; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: Mono 32/140 (0.5/140), Braid 30/240 (0.28/240;); Max Drag: 33 Lb (15.0 kg); Brake: Centrifugal

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - length 1000 yd (1000 m):
* Braid .008" (0.19 mm) - Test: 23 Lb (10.4 kg)
* Braid .009" (0.23 mm) - Test: 20 Lb (9.1 kg)
* Fluoro .016" (0.4 mm) - Test: 20 Lb (9.1 kg)
* Fluorocarbon Leader .016 (0.4) (x20) - Length: 0.82’; Test: 20 Lb (Test: 9.1 kg)
* Carolina Rig .016" (0.4 mm) (x10) - Length: 3 ft (1 m); Test: 20 Lb (9.1 kg)
* Texas Rig .016" (0.4 mm) (x10) - Length: 3 ft (1 m); Test: 20 Lb (9.1 kg)
* Offset Hooks: Offset Hook #1/0 (x5), Offset Hook #2/0 (x5), Offset Hook #3/0 (x5), Offset Hook #4/0 (x5), Offset Hook #5/0 (x5), Offset Hook #6/0 (x5)
* Bullet Sinkers: Bullet Sinker 3/8 Oz. (10 g) (x4), Bullet Sinker 5/8 Oz. (18 g) (x4), Bullet Sinker 6/7 Oz. (36 g) (x3), Bullet Sinker 1 1/4 Oz. (42 g) (x2), Bullet Sinker 1 1/2 Oz. (x2)
* Bass Jigs: Bass Jig 1 Oz. (28 g), #2/0 (x10), Bass Jig 1 Oz. (28 g), #4/0 (x10)
* Spinnerbaits: Spinnerbait 3/4 Oz. (21 g), #3/0 (x10), Spinnerbait 1 Oz. (28 g), #4/0 (x10)
* Buzzbaits: Buzzbait 6/7 Oz. (24 g), #4/0 (x5), Buzzbait 1 Oz. (28 g), #5/0 (x5)
* Soft Baits: Shad 4" (10 cm) (x20), Shad 6" (15 cm) (x20), Ribbed Shad 4" (10 cm) (x10), Ribbed Shad 6" (15 cm) (x10)
* Worms: Worm 3" (7 cm) (x20), Worm 5" (12.5 cm) (x20)

EQUIPMENT
* RIVERTEX™ WBT RodSheath Rod Case - Rods: 2; Reels: 4; Lines: 2
* Garry Scott™ WBT Bass Winner Jacket - Tackles: 15; Lines: 2
* Garry Scott™ FishFort XS - Max Single Fish Weight: 22 Lb (10 kg); Total Fish Weight: 154 Lb (70 kg)

ADVANCED FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
Florida
Louisiana
Mississippi
Bolivia
Brazil
detailed_description:
Compete in catching the most popular American fish species with the help of World Bass Tour Pack, a set of tournament tackle carefully designed for the true bass professionals. It contains a pair of sturdy rods and reels capable of handling unique trophies; a generous assortment of great baits, bass jigs, spinnerbaits, and other lures that no Bass can resist! linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
